SEARCH

All Packages

Package Summary
Package
Description
org.db.connecting
Package that have files responsible for Establishing connection with DB (Connection.java) Getting all data from DB (Data.java) Getting details for logging in (LoggingIn.java)
org.db.interfaces
Package that have functional interfaces Functional.java Functional2.java
org.db.manage
Package that have files responsible for Adding or deleting questions (Adding.java & Deleting.java) Sorting DB (Sorting.java) Preparing String to further usage (StringOperations.java) Changing password/login (ChangePassword.java) Storing current table (SQL.java) Getting answers and questions in String array (ToStrings.java) Getting info about records in current table (SQL.java)
org.db.reset
Package that have file responsible for reseting whole DB Reset.java
org.db.tables
Package that have files responsible for managing tables Adding tables (Add.java) Deleting tables (Delete.java)
org.exceptions.exceptions
Package that contains custom exceptions: CustomException.java
org.exceptions.file
Package that contains file responsible for writing error log ERRORS.java
org.exceptions.ui
Package that contains UI version of exceptions ExceptionUI.java
org.file
Package that have file responsible for writing down what happened when program was running (Writing.java)
org.score
Package that contains File that is responsible for keeping eye on score (Count.java)
org.ui
Main package that contains Main file and two sub-packages
org.ui.swing
Package that has all files required for proper working of Swing version of Quiz
Note that these are only UI files
org.ui.swing.admin
Package that has files required to maintain DB
Also, it has sub-package that contains files accessible through AdminOthers
org.ui.swing.admin.other.details
Package that have file Details which is responsible for allowing user to change password or/and login
org.ui.swing.admin.other.table
Package that have files AddTable ChangeTable DeleteTable TablesChange which are responsible for allowing user to manage tables in DB
org.ui.swing.admin.other.tutorial
Package that contains file AdminTutorial which is UI for showing admin the how-to in managing this program
org.ui.swing.exceptions
 
org.ui.swing.hq
Package that have file responsible for calling other classes that show questions (HQ.java)
org.ui.swing.other
Package that is able to show to user less important things such as credits info
org.ui.swing.questions
Package that contains question's UI
org.ui.swing.score
Package that has files responsible for: Showing user if his answer was correct or not Showing him his final score
org.ui.swing.tutorial
Package that has file responsible for showing user how-to
org.uiProperties
Package that has class that stores all properties of UI design
